webPage.name: Social Media Recruiting & Scheduling | Flowxtra Australia
webPage.description: Plan and automate Australian hiring content across LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and WhatsApp. Flowxtra keeps employer branding assets, approvals, and ATS workflows in sync.

mainEntity.name: Does Flowxtra adapt to Australian time zones?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Schedule posts in AEST, ACST, or AWST and keep hiring campaigns aligned with local calendars.

mainEntity.name: Can we collaborate with agencies on approvals?

acceptedAnswer.text: Invite agencies or contractors to draft content, tag stakeholders, and receive approval notifications before publishing.
